definition: to be skillful with one's hands/to be manually adroit
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The heart of profit from woman is deft, the kitchen also becomes amorous feelings 10 thousand kinds.

sentences.english: Because for all of its dangers, globalization is in part a product of American leadership and the ingenuity of the American people.
